verses.text: So \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead. In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

For he took \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* of the \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \add gods\add*, and the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H7665"\w* the \w images|strong="H4676"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w* the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*:\f + \fr 14.3 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*

And \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* and the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*.

Also he took \w away|strong="H5493"\w* out of all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* and the \w images|strong="H2553"\w*: and the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* was \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft images: Heb. sun images\f*

¶ And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w fenced|strong="H4694"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* had \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, and he had no \w war|strong="H4421"\w* in those \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had given him \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

Therefore he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, Let us \w build|strong="H1129"\w* these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and make \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \add them\add* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, and \w towers|strong="H4026"\w*, \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*, \add while\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* yet \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us; because we have \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, we have \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \add him\add*, and he hath given us \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*. So they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* and \w prospered|strong="H6743"\w*.

And \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* had an \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \add of men\add* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w targets|strong="H6793"\w* and \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*, out of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*; and out of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* and \w drew|strong="H1869"\w* \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*, two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*: all these \add were\add* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

¶ And there came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* against them \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3569"\w* with an \w host|strong="H2428"\w* of a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*; and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*.

Then \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* him, and they set the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Zephathah|strong="H6859"\w* at \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*.

And \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add it is\add* nothing with thee to \w help|strong="H5826"\w*, \w whether|strong="H0996"\w* with \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, or with them that have no \w power|strong="H3581"\w*: \w help|strong="H5826"\w* us, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for we \w rest|strong="H8172"\w* on thee, and in thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* we \w go|strong="H0935"\w* against this \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*. O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, thou \add art\add* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; let not \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w prevail|strong="H6113"\w* against thee.  +  r 14.11  t man: or, mortal man *

So the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5062"\w* the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*.

And \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* them unto \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*: and the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* were \w overthrown|strong="H5307"\w*, that they could not \w recover|strong="H4241"\w* themselves; for they were \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w host|strong="H4264"\w*; and they carried \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.\f + \fr 14.13 \ft destroyed: Heb. broken\f*

And they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*; for the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came upon them: and they \w spoiled|strong="H0962"\w* all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*; for there was exceeding \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0961"\w* in them.

They \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* also the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* of \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and carried \w away|strong="H7617"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
